text:
August 29, 1963
Dr. Robert C. GoodelX, Chief
Radio English-Teaching Branch
USIA-Voice of America
Tei-^o JR, Room 2063
Washington 25, D.C.
Dear Bobs
I am enclosing a copy of the analysis of the U.S.I.A. Questionnaire on
Radio English Teaching which Dr. Walter Stone at the University of Pittsburg
submitted a few days ago.
We have asked Dr. Stone to draft a proposal which you may wish to consider
for seeking additional funds to carry out more extensive research on some
of the items included in the original questionnaire as well as a study of
the effectiveness of the programs themselves once they are wade available.
I shall let you know as soon as we receive any additional word from him.
Sincerely,
JAPssc
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
Enclosure
